price: No one fabricates lies except those who do not believe in the verses of Allah; it is they who are the liars.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innamā yaftarī al-kadhiba alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-kādhibūna
